mergewith.subtemplate: <plugin spec='phydyn.distribution.STreeLikelihoodODE' id="PhyDyn.t:$(n)"> <treeIntervals spec='TreeIntervals' id='TreeIntervals.t:$(n)' tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'/> <popModel spec="phydyn.model.PopModelODE" id="phydynPopModelODE.t:$(n)"> <definitions spec="phydyn.model.Definition" id="phydynDefinitions.t:$(n)"> </definitions> <matrixeqs spec="phydyn.model.MatrixEquation" id="phydynEquations.t:$(n)"> </matrixeqs> <popParams spec="phydyn.model.TrajectoryParameters" id="phydynPopParams.t:$(n)"> </popParams> <modelParams spec="phydyn.model.ModelParameters" id="phydynModelParams.t:$(n)"> </modelParams> </popModel> </plugin>
